expression.xpathExpression: //v3:observation/v3:templateId[@root='2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4' and @extension='2015-08-01']/ancestor::v3:observation[1]/v3:value[not(@nullFlavor) and not((ancestor::v3:encounter) or (ancestor::v3:act)) and ancestor::v3:section[not(@nullFlavor)]]

//v3:observation/v3:templateId[@root='2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4' and @extension='2015-08-01']/ancestor::v3:observation[1]/v3:value[not(@nullFlavor) and (ancestor::v3:encounter or ancestor::v3:act) and ancestor::v3:section[not(@nullFlavor)]]

//v3:observation/v3:templateId[@root='2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2' and @extension='2015-08-01']/ancestor::v3:observation[1]/v3:value[@xsi:type='PQ' and @unit and not(@nullFlavor) and ancestor::v3:section[not(@nullFlavor)]]

validator.name: RequiredNodeValidator
validator.validationMessage: If Observation/value is a physical quantity (xsi:type="PQ"), the unit of measure SHALL be selected from ValueSet UnitsOfMeasureCaseSensitive 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12839 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-31484).
